column2:
"This is a piece of a Quartz Dragon?
Wow, it's just as pretty as I'd heard."

"I guess that's why Matoi was so interested
in them. There must be some sort of a clue
here this time, don't you think?"

"<%me>, I really appreciate
all of your help!"

"これがクォーツ・ドラゴンの
体の一部ですか！
噂に違わず、きれいですね……"

"あんなに興味を示していたんですもの！
きっと今度こそ、何かの手掛かりに
なるに違いありませんよ！"
